channel.title: I'm so depressed!
channel.description:
I just found out that I won a $2000 computer on a Newegg YouTube contest that I don't even remember entering! Unfortunately I won in December and I just now checked my YouTube email telling me that I had won ... I only had 7 days to claim my prize :'(. I enter all these give away contests fully expecting not to win. I was so sure I hadn't won this one so much so that I didn't even check my YouTube email for 3 months. I never win anything and I just wasted my once in a life time chance to finally win something. Anyways let the lolz begin.
Here is a link to the contest, I guess computer number 2 would of been mine if I wasn't such a dumbass.
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=44gUfaOCcJg[/url]

item.title: I'm so depressed!

item.description:
I think it’s best if I close this now, OP is a dumbass, nuff said.

item.title: I'm so depressed!
item.dc:creator: Drakey83
item.description:
Jeez you guys are hardcore with your maliciousness. I wasn’t really looking for sympathy because I know you guys are all assholes. I meant this thread to make light of the subject, hence the “let the lolz begin” portion of of the first post, but you all are acting like I wanted it to be taken seriously.

In all reality I’m kinda bummed that I missed my chance but my current rig is already a pretty kickass computer so I can be to mad.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm so depressed!
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Drakey83:

I just found out that I won a $2000 computer on a Newegg YouTube contest that I don’t even remember entering! Unfortunately I won in December and I just now checked my YouTube email telling me that I had won … I only had 7 days to claim my prize :’(. I enter all these give away contests fully expecting not to win. I was so sure I hadn’t won this one so much so that I didn’t even check my YouTube email for 3 months. I never win anything and I just wasted my once in a life time chance to finally win something. Anyways let the lolz begin.

Here is a link to the contest, I guess computer number 2 would of been mine if I wasn’t such a dumbass.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=44gUfaOCcJg

hahaha what a fail

Anyway who gives a shit about some fancy prize? You don’t have a job to buy yourself a nice rig? well boohoo… it’s already more luck than any of us deserve, it’s more than a 1 in a billion chance that you are even alive today, and with every passing second that you don’t die, your luckiness exponentially increases. Out of all the people who lived in the past, your ancestors managed to beat the odds so that their family tree would reach out through history, hundreds of thousands of years later for you to be born thanks to this incredible chain reaction called evolution.

If I were you I would be depressed that I even made this thread, now everyone who reads it will share your feeling of disappointment even though it was all your fault.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm so depressed!
item.dc:creator: CPU
item.description:
Look on the bright side.

The UPS truck would have arrived and handed you the computer and grabbing it incorrectly would have thrown your back out. This would result in you having to be hospitalized and going through major back surgery that would have crippled you for the rest of your life. During your hospital stay, BM would have been released and, because of the drugs you were given, it would have resulted in major memory loss and you would believe your new computer was for being able to play Minesweeper on a 17" screen.

Read full topic
